siteMetadata.title: Piotr Mionskowski
siteMetadata.subtitle: Piotr Mionskowski's thoughts on software, technology, architecture, design patterns and programming in general.

node.excerpt: We have already touched upon the importance of timeouts and described most important related JDBC knobs. The next aspect of timeouts I would like to focus on is using API clients. Specifically HTTP clients which are by far the most popular. We will review couple of popular HTTP client libraries and their configurationâ€¦
